metadata.title: CVE-2024-35812 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: usb:cdc-wdm: close race between read and workqueue wdm_read() cannot race withitself. However, in service_outstanding_interrupt() it can race with theworkqueue, which can be triggered by error handling. Hence we need to makesure that the WDM_RESPONDING flag is not just only set but tested.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
